Title: IMDB Analysis
desc: This project was my personal project on analyzing and IMDB data. I use python notebook for data cleaning and tableau for data visualization. I do descriptive data analysis to understand the correlation between gross and each other attributes.

Title: Shopping Trend Analysis
desc: This study was conducted to understand the buyer pattern based on gender, product category, subscription status, states, and payment method, identify customer preference for every market segmentation, and support decision making of a business to be more accurate and based of data.

Title: Cateringz
desc: This repository contains my individual work on my college Human and Computer Interaction lab project. This project was about making a website for a large scale food vendor for wedding, birthday, and any other large events. This website was created using vanilla HTML, CSS, and Javascript.

Title: Pawscan
desc: This website was our final project on Software Engineering course. We create this website to predict dog breed around the world. This website can be used by downloading to local. This website runs on vanilla HTML, CSS, and JS as the front-end, Golang as the backend, and python as the prediction server.

Title: Snakeid
desc: This website is our final project on Artificial Intelligence course. This website of course focused on the AI and have minimalized front-end. Our AI uses pretrained model named vision transformer (VIT base patch 16) and is used to predict snake species.

Title: Comparison Study: CNN-LSTM or LSTM Transformer for Stock Market Prediction
desc: This research was motivated by the growing interest in stock trading and the lack of studies comparing AI models for market prediction. We used 3 Indonesian stock datasets to compare CNN-LSTM and LSTM-Transformer. From this research we concluded that CNN-LSTM is better than LSTM-Transformer.
